name: Hook
story: Boss (self-proclaimed) of an Underworld adventure squad, The Moles.She loves freedom and sees life as a series of adventures.

skills.name: Hehe! Don't Get Burned!
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Hey! Remember Hook?
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to a single enemy, with a high chance to inflict Burn on the enemy.

skills.name: Boom! Here Comes the Fire!
skills.description: Deals massive Fire DMG to a single enemy and Enhances this unit's next Skill.

skills.name: Ha! Oil to the Flames!
skills.description: When attacking a Burned enemy, deals Additional Fire DMG for a moderate amount, and additionally regenerates energy.

skills.name: Ack! Look at This Mess!
skills.description: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Fire DMG to a random single enemy, with a high chance to inflict Burn on all enemy targets.

skills.name: Hey! Remember Hook?
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to a single enemy with a high chance of inflicting Burn, also deals minor Fire DMG to enemies adjacent to it.

eidolons.name: Early to Bed, Early to Rise
Happy Tummy, Happy Body
eidolons.description: Extends the duration of Burn caused by Skill by 1 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Don't Be Picky, Nothing's Icky
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: It's Okay to Not Know
eidolons.description: When Talent is triggered, there is a 100% base chance to Burn enemies adjacent to the target enemy, equivalent to that of Skill.

eidolons.name: Let the Moles' Deeds Be Known
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Always Ready to Punch and Kick
eidolons.description: Hook deals 20% more DMG to enemies afflicted with Burn.
